name: Moon Cypher
description:
Note: This game uses Chrome's Voice Recognition API. It may not work on other browsers.

Moon Cypher is a voice-controlled browser game designed specially for people with physical limitations that prevent them from playing videogames with their hands or movements.

You play as an alien that fall in a strange planet and now need to recover the parts of your spaceship and get back home.

Instructions:

- Hold the spacebar to speak a command.
- Speak the command loud and clear.
- Try to not speak too fast.

Speak Commands:

GO: Make the alien start to walk
STOP: Make the alien stop
JUMP: Make the alien jump
TURN: Make the alien turn around to the other direction
